name: Deathblade

name: Repeating Crossbow
game_description: When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants additional +20% Attack Speed and +20% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.
short_descroption: When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants additional +20% Attack Speed and +20% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
game_description: The wearer's spells can critically strike.
short_descroption: The wearer's spells can critically strike.

name: Hand of Justice
game_description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic Attacks and spells deal +40% Damage or Basic Attacks heal 40 Health on-hit.
short_descroption: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic Attacks and spells deal +40% Damage or Basic Attacks heal 40 Health on-hit.

name: Iceborne Gauntlet
game_description: When the wearer dodges, they create a zone of ice. Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by 35%.
short_description: When the wearer dodges, they create a zone of ice. Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by 35%.

name: Quicksilver
game_description: The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after 3 seconds.
short_descroption: The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after 3 seconds.

name: Trap Claw
game_description: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gains a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 5 seconds.
short_descroption: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gains a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 5 seconds.

name: Mittens
game_description: Wearer is also a yordle.

name: Thief's Gloves
game_description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.
short_descroption: At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.
